Monologue.Current: Фудзин{Line}“СЕЙФЕР, ВЫПЬЕШЬ?”
Monologue.Original: Fujin{Line}“SEIFER.{Line} DRINK?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Seifer}{Line}“.........”
Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“.........”

Monologue.Current: Райдзин{Line}“О, да, и мне чё-нить прихвати!{Line} Глотка сохнет, понимаешь ли...”
Monologue.Original: Raijin{Line}“...Can I drink somethin’?{Line} I’d like some water, ya know.”

Monologue.Current: Фудзин{Line}“ИГНОР.”
Monologue.Original: Fujin{Line}“...IGNORE.”

Monologue.Current: Фудзин{Line}“ЧТО?”
Monologue.Original: Fujin{Line}“WHAT?”

Monologue.Current: Райдзин{Line}“Йо! Это ж {Char Squall}!”{Next}“Чё-нить хочешь?{Line} Фудьзин угощает.”
Monologue.Original: Raijin{Line}“Yo, it’s {Char Squall}.”{Next}“Oh yeah,{Line} Fujin’s gonna treat, ya know?{Line} Want somethin’?”

Monologue.Current: Райдзин{Line}“?”
Monologue.Original: Raijin{Line}“?”

Monologue.Current: Фудзин{Line}“ЯРОСТЬ!”
Monologue.Original: Fujin{Line}“RAGE!”

Monologue.Current: Райдзин{Line}“!!!!!!!!!”
Monologue.Original: Raijin{Line}“!!!!!!!!!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Seifer}{Line}“{Char Squall}...{Line} Разве ты не видишь, что представители{Line} дисциплинарного комитета заняты?{Line} Не отвлекай. Иди, потренируйся{Line} где-нибудь махать железякой.”
Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“...{Char Squall},{Line} can’t you see the disciplinary committee’s{Line} busy? Don’t bother us.”

Monologue.Current: Райдзин{Line}“Ай!.. Ууу... Ааа...”
Monologue.Original: Raijin{Line}“Ahh...Ouuu...Ahh...”

Monologue.Current: Райдзин{Line}“{Char Squall}, ш-ш... с-шш... с-с... {Line} (Не парься, братишка, Фудзин{Line} иногда заносит. Баба, все дела.{Line} Но лучше не суйся под горячую руку.)”
Monologue.Original: Raijin{Line}“{Char Squall}, psst...psst...psst...{Line}(Fujin’s kinda harsh at times{Line} so you betta watch it too, ya know?)”

Monologue.Current: Фудзин{Line}“ЧТО?”
Monologue.Original: Fujin{Line}“WHAT?”

Monologue.Current: Райдзин{Line}“А... Я говорю...{Line} погода вот, понимаешь...”
Monologue.Original: Raijin{Line}“O-Oh!{Line} I-It’s nothin’!”

Monologue.Current: “Фффууух!.. Уф... Тяжко...”{Next}“У вас... булочки... ещё остались?”
Monologue.Original: “Huff, huff, heave, heave...”{Next}“D-Do you have any...hot dogs left?”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Извините, молодой человек,{Line} вы неможно опоздали.”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“You’re a bit late, I’m afraid.{Line} We’re all sold out!”

Monologue.Current: “Ааааааргх!!!{Line} Опять! Ну что за?..”{Next}“Ну ладно, ещё посмотрим кто кого!{Line} В следующий раз я здесь заночую!..”
Monologue.Original: “Damn!{Line} Not again...!”{Next}“It’s hopeless if you don’t get here early...{Line} Alright, I’ll try again next time...”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Я попробую заказать побольше,{Line} но ничего не обещаю!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“I’ll try to order more,{Line} but there’s no guarantee!”

Monologue.Current: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“Hi. We only got enough hot dogs{Line} for people waitin’ in line.”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“Hi. We only got enough hot dogs{Line} for people waitin’ in line.”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Булочки закончились.”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“No more hot dogs today.”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Мы ещё не открылись.”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“We’re not open yet.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Seifer}{Line}“Бег в общественном месте...”{Next}“Пошли, арестуем засранца{Line} за нарушение правил академии.”
Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“...Speeding.”{Next}“Let’s go arrest that student{Line} for violation of academy regulations.”

Monologue.Current: Райдзин{Line}“Принято, шеф.”
Monologue.Original: Raijin{Line}“Roger, ya know!”

Monologue.Current: “ПОДДЕРЖИВАЮ!”
Monologue.Original: “AFFIRMATIVE!”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Да? Если ты за булочками,{Line} вставай в конец очереди!”{Next}“Сид ты там или нет, мне без разницы!{Line} Здесь действиуют только мои правила!{Line} Никаких исключений, ни для кого!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“Yes? If it’s hot dogs you want,{Line} better get in back of the line!”{Next}“I don’t care if you’re a SeeD or what.{Line} You go by MY rules here!{Line} No special treatment for anyone!”

Monologue.Current: “Heh,{Line} looks like I can buy some today.”
Monologue.Original: “Heh,{Line} looks like I can buy some today.”

Monologue.Current: “There’s always a huge line{Line} and like, you can’t buy any...”
Monologue.Original: “There’s always a huge line{Line} and like, you can’t buy any...”

Monologue.Current: “The deep fried cream-filled banana{Line} nut strawberry donuts... Mmmmm.”{Next}“I wonder why there’s always so many left.{Line} They’re so good...”
Monologue.Original: “The deep fried cream-filled banana{Line} nut strawberry donuts... Mmmmm.”{Next}“I wonder why there’s always so many left.{Line} They’re so good...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“.........”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“.........”

Monologue.Current: “I hope I can buy one.”
Monologue.Original: “I hope I can buy one.”

Monologue.Current: “Oh, please let there be one left for me.”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, please let there be one left for me.”

Monologue.Current: “This is the end of the line.{Line} Wanna wait? Hm?”{Line}Wait in line{Line}Forget it
Monologue.Original: “This is the end of the line.{Line} Wanna wait? Hm?”{Line}Wait in line{Line}Forget it

Monologue.Current: “Ok, you’re behind me then.”
Monologue.Original: “Ok, you’re behind me then.”

Monologue.Current: “Whatever.{Line} I was just being nice...”
Monologue.Original: “Whatever.{Line} I was just being nice...”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“This is a journey to{Line} defeat the sorceress.{Line} Garden will now be used as a mobile base.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“This is a journey to{Line} defeat the sorceress.{Line} Garden will now be used as a mobile base.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“The administration of Garden will be{Line} run by myself and the staff, as usual.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“The administration of Garden will be{Line} run by myself and the staff, as usual.”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Я работаю здесь уже{Line} много лет.”{Next}“Как же здорово быть молодым,{Line} жизнерадостным, полным энергии,{Line} с заветной мечтой и...”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“I’ve worked here for{Line} many a year now.”{Next}“I must say, being young is so great.{Line} It’s like this burst of energy flowing{Line} within you...constantly, and...”

Monologue.Current: (Ох, чувствую, это затянется...){Line}(Может, свалить по-тихому?..){Line}(Улизну!){Line}(Послушаю...)
Monologue.Original: (Oh man...{Line} This may take a while...){Line}(Think of an excuse and leave){Line}(Sneak away){Line}(I’ll lend an ear...)

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Серьёзно, когда я вижу вас,{Line} сама начинаю чувствовать себя моложе!”{Next}“Думаю: ‘Эй, а ведь есть ещё{Line} порох в пороховницах!’{Line} Ну, ты знаешь!”{Next}“Ой. Хахахаха! Что я несу?!{Line} Хахахаха! Не обращай внимания,{Line} совсем заработалась.”{Next}“Ну, как бы то ни было, у меня есть{Line} сын примерно твоего возраста,{Line} но он такой растяпа, и...”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“But seriously,{Line} with all these youngsters around,{Line} I’m beginning to feel young myself.”{Next}“I start thinking to myself,{Line} ‘Hey, I’m still all that!’{Line} You know what I mean!”{Next}“Ahahahahah!{Line} What am I saying!?{Line} Ahahahahah!”{Next}“Well anyway, I have a son{Line} about your age, but he is{Line} just so incompetent, and...”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Серьёзно, когда я вижу вас,{Line} сама начинаю чувствовать себя моложе!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“But seriously,{Line} with all these youngsters around,{Line} I’m beginning to feel young myself.”

Monologue.Current: “Думаю: ‘Эй, а ведь есть ещё{Line} порох в пороховницах!’{Line} Ну, ты знаешь!”
Monologue.Original: “I start thinking to myself,{Line} ‘Hey, I’m still all that!’{Line} You know what I mean!”

Monologue.Current: “Ой. Хахахаха! Что я несу?!{Line} Хахахаха! Не обращай внимания,{Line} совсем заработалась.”
Monologue.Original: “Ahahahahah!{Line} What am I saying!?{Line} Ahahahahah!”

Monologue.Current: “Ну, как бы то ни было, у меня есть{Line} сын примерно твоего возраста,{Line} но он такой растяпа, и...”
Monologue.Original: “Well anyway, I have a son{Line} about your age, but he is{Line} so incompetent, and...”

Monologue.Current: (Так и знал, что это надолго!..){Line}(Может, свалить?..){Line}(Улизну!){Line}(Дослушаю!)
Monologue.Original: (You’re still talking!?{Line} This could mean trouble...){Line}(Think of an excuse and leave){Line}(Sneak away){Line}(I’ll lend an ear...)

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Эй! Ты куда?!{Line} Мы же разговариваем!”{Next}“Так...{Line} О чём я?..{Line} Ах да! Мой сын...”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“Hey! Where do you think you’re going!?{Line} You don’t just leave in the middle{Line} of a conversation!”{Next}“Let’s see...{Line} Where was I again?{Line} Oh yes, my son. It was about my son.”

Monologue.Current: “Моему мальчику{Line} было далеко да вас.{Line} Не такой умный и вобще...”{Next}“Я очень переживала за его будущее.{Line} И вот, представь, примерно{Line} около года назад...”{Next}“Приходит он ко мне и говорит:{Line} ‘Я ухожу, чтобы найти себя!’{Line} Представляешь?!”{Next}“Мягко говоря, я от такого опешила,{Line} но у моего малыша был такой{Line} серьёзный вид...”{Next}“Я просто не смогла{Line} ему запретить!”{Next}“Если бы я тогда знала, каких{Line} нервов нам с мужем будет стоить{Line} это его приключение...”{Next}“Но ты бы видел, как он изменился!{Line} Возмужал, повзрослел!..{Line} И снова ушёл...”{Next}“Мне так одиноко без него...{Line} Ох, прости, дорогой.{Line} Я увлеклась.”{Next}“Всякий раз, когда я вижу вас, молодёжь,{Line} я вспоминаю своего мальчика.{Line} Где он сейчас?..”
Monologue.Original: “So my son,{Line} he’s not as bright as{Line} all you here, so...”{Next}“I was worried about{Line} his future.{Line} Then about a year ago...”{Next}“‘I’m goin’ on a journey{Line} to see what I can do!’{Line} he said. Can you believe him!?”{Next}“I was really surprised{Line} at first, but...”{Next}“My son had this serious look{Line} I’d never seen before.”{Next}“So I built up enough courage and{Line} told him to go for it.”{Next}“Well, when I look back{Line} at it now, all he did was{Line} make my husband and me, worry.”{Next}“But now, my, has he matured.{Line} He’s grown up, I tell you.”{Next}“It sure gets lonely{Line} without him.”{Next}“...Oh my, I’m sorry.{Line} I got carried away.”{Next}“Whenever I see you youngsters{Line} I just get nostalgic.{Line} I wonder where he is now...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Простите, но я немного спешу...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“...Sorry but, I’m kinda in a hurry.”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“О, конечно, ступай.{Line} Заходи как-нибудь ещё...”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“Oh, all right.{Line} Come back again, ya’hear?”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Вот сдача.{Line} Магазин рядом.”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“This is for returns.{Line} The store is next door.”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Детишки так увлечены{Line} диетами...”{Next}“У них не будет животика,{Line} как у меня!{Line} Хахахаха!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“Kids these days{Line} are so concerned about{Line} dieting.”{Next}“They won’t be able to{Line} get a tummy like mine!{Line} Ahahahahaha!”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Ох, кручусь, как белка в колесе!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“My oh my!{Line} I’m just busy as a bee!”

Monologue.Current: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“I hear you’re a leader!{Line} I’m rootin’ for ya, all the way!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“I hear you’re a leader!{Line} I’m rootin’ for ya, all the way!”

Monologue.Current: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“I’ve never seen you around before.{Line} Are you new here?”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“I’ve never seen you around before.{Line} Are you new here?”

Monologue.Current: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“So you’re the one that found him?{Line} Thank you! I am just soooo happy!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“So you’re the one that found him?{Line} Thank you! I am just soooo happy!”

Monologue.Current: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“You, with the long hair!”{Next}“So you’re the one{Line} who told my son I was here?{Line} Thank you so much!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“You, with the long hair!”{Next}“So you’re the one{Line} who told my son I was here?{Line} Thank you so much!”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“И откуда ты узнал,{Line} что я обожаю карты?”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“How did you know I enjoy{Line} playing cards...?”

Monologue.Current: “Ну, сыграем тогда, что ли?..”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: “Well, shall we play some cards then?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Вот это да, неплохо!{Line} Буду практиковаться, заходи ещё!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“Hey, not bad!{Line} I’ll be practicing, so come again!”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Хахахаха. Не расстраивайся.{Line} Не могла же я проиграть ребёнку!{Line} Возвращайся, когда подрастёшь!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“There’s no way I’ll lose{Line} to a youngster like you!{Line} Come back when you’re older! Ahahaha...”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Ничья...{Line} А ты хорошо держался!{Line} Как-нибудь повторим!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“Hmmm, a draw...{Line} You put up quite a fight!{Line} Let’s settle this next time!”

Monologue.Current: Cafeteria Lady’s Son{Line}“You’re pretty good...{Line} I still have a ways to go.”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady’s Son{Line}“You’re pretty good...{Line} I still have a ways to go.”

Monologue.Current: Cafeteria Lady’s Son{Line}“You can’t even beat me!?{Line} You’re no challenge for my mama.”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady’s Son{Line}“You can’t even beat me!?{Line} You’re no challenge for my mama.”

Monologue.Current: Cafeteria Lady’s Son{Line}“We’ll settle this next time!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady’s Son{Line}“We’ll settle this next time!”

Monologue.Current: Cafeteria Lady’s Son{Line}“Well, I’ve decided to help out here.{Line} Gotta look after mama, you know.”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady’s Son{Line}“Well, I’ve decided to help out here.{Line} Gotta look after mama, you know.”

Monologue.Current: Cafeteria Lady’s Son{Line}“Darn!{Line} Never should’ve offered to help out!”{Next}“Just wait...{Line} I’ll find a way to continue my journey!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady’s Son{Line}“Darn!{Line} Never should’ve offered to help out!”{Next}“Just wait...{Line} I’ll find a way to continue my journey!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“This is the cafeteria.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“This is the cafeteria.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Obviously, this is where we take our meals,{Line} but keep in mind, there’s always{Line} competition for the good stuff.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Obviously, this is where we take our meals,{Line} but keep in mind, there’s always{Line} competition for the good stuff.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Especially the hot dogs.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Especially the hot dogs.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Some of the hot dogs are so{Line} popular, you’ll be lucky just to see{Line} someone eat it.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Some of the hot dogs are so{Line} popular, you’ll be lucky just to see{Line} someone eat it.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“That’s why you see{Line} this long line, everyday.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“That’s why you see{Line} this long line, everyday.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“If you get there too late...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“If you get there too late...”

Monologue.Current: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“We’ve sold out for today!{Line} Sorry!”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“We’ve sold out for today!{Line} Sorry!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“...That’s what happens.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“...That’s what happens.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“I see...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“I see...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“......?{Line} What’s so funny?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“......?{Line} What’s so funny?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“You’re so serious when you’re explaining.{Line} It just seems...kinda odd...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“You’re so serious when you’re explaining.{Line} It just seems...kinda odd...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“You’re the one who asked me to{Line} show you around.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“You’re the one who asked me to{Line} show you around.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Oh, I’m sorry...{Line} You don’t have to get mad like that...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Oh, I’m sorry...{Line} You don’t have to get mad like that...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Ok, next.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Ok, next.”

Monologue.Current: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“Sorry, all sold out today.”
Monologue.Original: Cafeteria Lady{Line}“Sorry, all sold out today.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Dammit!{Line} Not again...!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Dammit!{Line} Not again...!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“...Hey, if it isn’t {Char Squall}.{Line} How long were you here?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“...Hey, if it isn’t {Char Squall}.{Line} How long were you here?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“...We saw the whole thing.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“...We saw the whole thing.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Huh!? {Char Rinoa}’s here, too!?{Line} Oh man, I’m not always like that, ok?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Huh!? {Char Rinoa}’s here, too!?{Line} Oh man, I’m not always like that, ok?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“So you couldn’t buy any...?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“So you couldn’t buy any...?”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“A-Ah... It’s ok to miss one meal a day.{Line} I...I’ve gained some weight lately, too.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“A-Ah... It’s ok to miss one meal a day.{Line} I...I’ve gained some weight lately, too.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“W-Well, see ya!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“W-Well, see ya!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“S’up {Char Squall}?{Line} Long line as usual.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“S’up {Char Squall}?{Line} Long line as usual.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“You gonna line up?”{Line}(...Yeah){Line}(...Nah)
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“You gonna line up?”{Line}(...Yeah){Line}(...Nah)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Yeah.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Yeah.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Then get behind me.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Then get behind me.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Nah.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Nah.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Oh, ok...{Line} No biggie.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Oh, ok...{Line} No biggie.”
